name: Hatches
description:
A digital pirate simulator.

Entry for Ludum Dare 42.

Theme: Running out of space.

Game Hatches. A digital pirate/student simulator, where you enter into shady agreements in order to get money to survive.

You sell Flash Drives full of new pirated digital releases.

You get those via ultimate JetGet program, provided by your partner.

Make sure you keep all you disks clean while trying to get money for education payment!

Controls: mouse. 

Platform: PC, downloadable.
